ygData.msgSnippet: (Ummm...I m pretty sure when Optimus was in charge, that battle was the Third Cybertronian War.  I ll have to e-mail Raksha or Rob Jung) Unitron: Unitron

(Ummm...I'm pretty sure when Optimus was in charge, that battle was the Third 
Cybertronian War.  I'll have to e-mail Raksha or Rob Jung)


Unitron:




Unitron laughed at Hot Rod's remark, falling to his knees from the trip, but 
leapt forward with his right shoulder out in an attempt to knock the 
ex-Autobot over.

"The Matrix didn't choose you.  Primus didn't choose you.  The only reason 
you were awarded the Matrix is because everyone else was dead, and the 
remaining few were idiots!  Rodimus Prime was and is the worst leader in the 
history of Cybertron itself!"
